ISSUE.TITLE: Error on start: bean of type 'org.springframework.samples.petclinic.mapper.OwnerMapper' that could not be found.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Getting this error on start the boot class Parameter 1 of constructor in org.springframework.samples.petclinic.rest.OwnerRestController required a bean of type 'org.springframework.samples.petclinic.mapper.OwnerMapper' that could not be found.
